subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: For the first time in his 16-year career, Shaquille O’Neal is not an All-Star. But his hulking frame still cast a very large shadow at this All-Star Weekend.
snippet: For the first time in his 16-year career, Shaquille O’Neal is not an All-Star. But his hulking frame still cast a very large shadow at this All-Star Weekend.
